about_the_game:
Undead Kingdom Survivors is an action-roguelike multiplayer game where you have to survive an onslaught of the undead. Unlock heroes, choose powerful abilities and strengthen yourself with upgrades to vanquish your enemies.


SURVIVE WITH YOUR FRIENDS


Assemble up to 2 additional friends to slay your enemies in co-op.

CHOOSE A HERO


Choose among various heroes and their various strengths and abilities.

OR SURVIVE ALONE


You can choose to play alone and fight the hordes by yourself.

Features:

  • Destroy thousands of undead minions
  • Dodge the constant spell casting of Necros
  • Play with up to 2 friends
  • Unlock higher difficulties
  • Unlock mighty heroes
  • Choose powerful abilities
  • Collect points and be the best in the rankings
  • Unlock various and unique achievements
  • Unlock upgrades to strengthen yourself

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the characters show a little bit more skin.

name: Undead Kingdom Survivors Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Prepare to face the relentless onslaught of the undead! Clear the undead realm either solo or with up to 2 friends in online multiplayer. Choose powerful abilities to vanquish hordes of undead. Upgrade stats and unlock new heroes as you strive for survival in this intense roguelite bullet hell.
